localize.text: The energy output of our facility is ever increasing.
You have proven that you are much more capable than you originally perceived yourself to be.
The high echelon is watching you.
Our founder, A, is among them.
What do you know about A?
A farmer who sowed seeds on a virgin soil no one had approached before.
In time, he may express interest in meeting you in person.
If that happens, you will be able to make your dreams come true.
Myself? Well, of course I highly admire him.
But to be fair, he is the one who created me.
He is also an enigmatic person.
I imagine there are few who can truly understand him.
In fact, to truly understand anyone is difficult.
Will the day come that I understand you completely?
